member.name: IInkD2DRenderer.Draw
member.summary: Renders the ink stroke to the designated Direct2D device context of the app.
member.param: Pointer to the designated Direct2D device context of the app.
Pointer to the collection of ink strokes to render.

param.name: fHighContrast
param.para: True, if the high-contrast accessibility option, in Windows 10 and earlier, is currently selected (Settings -> Ease of Access -> High Contrast -> Use high contrast). Otherwise, false.
Listen for the HighContrastChanged event to set this value appropriately.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInkD2DRenderer
member.summary: Enables the rendering of ink strokes onto the designated Direct2D device context of a Universal Windows app, instead of the default InkCanvas control.
